weekly picks (Jul 2 week 2022)

Posted on July 4, 2022 in 2022jul 

A WordCloud of 2022 Jul 2nd week collection

  1. 2207.00783 Real-space pairing through a confined local nematic state in cuprate superconductors (arXiv)

  2. 2207.00829 SU(2) gauge theory of the pseudogap phase in the two-dimensional Hubbard model (Hubbard model, arXiv)

  3. 2207.01226 Mechanism of Superconductivity: A Theory (arXiv)

  4. 2207.01515 Probing Majorana Bound States via Thermoelectric Transport (majorana, arXiv)

  5. 2207.01541 Evidence against superconductivity in flux trapping experiments on hydrides under high pressure (arXiv)

  6. 2207.00628 Valence Transition Theory of the Pressure-Induced Dimensionality Crossover in Superconducting Sr${14-x}$Ca$_x$Cu${24}$O$_{41}$ (arXiv)

  7. 2207.00629 Crystal growth and magnetic behavior of CeCl3 (Ce, arXiv)

  8. 2207.00789 Robust magnetic order upon ultrafast excitation of an antiferromagnet (arXiv)

  9. 2207.00854 A symmetry principle for gauge theories with fractons (arXiv)

  10. 2207.01120 Chiral surface spin textures in Cu$_2$OSeO$_3$ unveiled by soft x-ray scattering in specular reflection geometry (arXiv)

  11. 2207.01359 Recipe for higher-order topology on the triangular lattice (Cano, arXiv)

  12. 2207.01416 Moire-driven multiferroic order in twisted CrCl$_3$, CrBr$_3$ and CrI$_3$ bilayers (Lado, arXiv)

  13. 2207.01471 Mottness in 2-dimensional van der Waals Nb$_3$X$_8$ (JPHu, arXiv)

  14. 2207.00266 Comparative study of the charge order in the undoped infinite-layer nickelate superconductors (arXiv)

  15. 2207.00483 Contribution of Collective Excitations to Third Harmonic Generation in Multiband Superconductors: the case of MgB$_2$ (MgB2, arXiv)

  16. 2207.00096 Magnetic order in a coherent two-dimensional Kondo lattice (arXiv)

  17. 2207.00145 Fully-gapped superconducting state in interstitial-carbon-doped Zr5Pt3 (arXiv)

  18. 2207.00184 Fingerprints of nematicity and competing orders in the infinite-layer nickelate (arXiv)

  19. 2207.00250 Ferromagnetic diagonal stripe states in the two-dimensional Hubbard model with $U\lesssim\infty$ (VMC, arXiv)

  20. 2207.00365 Superexchange and Spin-Orbit Coupling in Mono and Bilayer Chromium Trihalides (CrI3, arXiv)

  21. 2207.00382 Evolution of magnetic phase in two dimensional van der Waals Mn$_{1-x}$Ni$_x$PS$_3$ single crystals (arXiv)

  22. 2206.09347 Enhancement of spin mixing conductance by $s$-$d$ orbital hybridization in heavy metals (arXiv)

  23. 2207.00020 Nonsymmorphic Symmetry Protected Dirac, Mobius, and Hourglass Fermions in Topological Materials (arXiv)
